channel.title: Trying to run jarmaker on my VPS
channel.description:
Hey guys, I need to jar my Client again but I want to do it from my VPS so it is easier in the future, but whenever I run it, I receive this error.
[code] C:\Users\Administrator\Downloads\JAR Maker>java -jar JARMaker.jar 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
What's goin on?

item.title: Trying to run jarmaker on my VPS
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

^What he said here is a tutorial I made on that
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,557965.msg4081924.html#msg4081924

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to run jarmaker on my VPS

item.title: Trying to run jarmaker on my VPS
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Java is not on your path. Update your environmental variables to point to your installation.

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to run jarmaker on my VPS
